scripts.name: ES Professional Fade Strategy
scripts.description: Professional ES futures fade strategy trading opening gaps with comprehensive filters. Includes ATR volatility filter, NYSE TICK breadth analysis, execution penalty modeling for realistic slippage near market open, and sophisticated position management. Fully compliant with Pine Script v5 official coding standards.
scripts.author: Your Name

parameters.name: openingRangeLengthInput
parameters.description: Opening range period in minutes (5, 15, or 30)

parameters.name: tickFilterInput
parameters.description: NYSE TICK extreme threshold for breadth filter

parameters.name: tickLookbackInput
parameters.description: Bars to check for TICK extremes

parameters.name: tickVetoCountInput
parameters.description: Number of extreme TICK readings to veto trade

parameters.name: maxHoldBarsInput
parameters.description: Maximum bars to hold position (5m bars)

parameters.name: useExecPenaltyInput
parameters.description: Apply execution penalty model near open

parameters.name: execWindowMinsInput
parameters.description: Duration of penalty window in minutes

backtest.notes: Professional fade strategy for ES futures. Requires NYSE TICK data feed. Backtest parameters use realistic commission ($2.01 per contract per side) and execution penalty modeling. Strategy trades only during Regular Trading Hours (RTH: 9:30 AM - 4:00 PM ET). Best results on 5-minute timeframe. IMPORTANT: Futures trading involves substantial risk - always paper trade thoroughly before live implementation.

scripts.notes: Advanced mean-reversion strategy designed specifically for E-mini S&P 500 futures. Key features: (1) Identifies significant overnight gaps using percentage and ATR filters, (2) Waits for opening range formation, (3) Enters fade trades when price fails at overnight extremes, (4) Uses NYSE TICK as breadth filter to avoid trading into strong trends, (5) Models execution difficulty near market open with configurable penalty, (6) Targets previous RTH close with protective stops at overnight extremes, (7) Includes time-based and end-of-day exits. v2.5.0: Refactored to meet TradingView official Pine Script v5 standards - added comprehensive constants section, explicit type declarations, proper script organization with detailed documentation, Input suffix conventions, and professional code structure. Requires active NYSE TICK data subscription.

scripts.name: RSI Divergence Detector
scripts.description: Automatically detects bullish and bearish divergences on RSI. Identifies both regular and hidden divergences. Fully compliant with Pine Script v5 official coding standards.
scripts.author: Your Name

parameters.name: pivotLookbackInput
parameters.description: Bars to look back for pivot detection

parameters.name: showRsiPanelInput
parameters.description: Display RSI in a separate panel with levels

scripts.notes: Best used on higher timeframes to reduce false signals. v1.3.0: Refactored to meet TradingView official Pine Script v5 standards - added constants section for all colors and thresholds, explicit type declarations, proper script organization with license header, data sufficiency checks, and Input suffix conventions. Detects 4 types of divergences: bullish/bearish regular and hidden.
